sentences.sContent: This is something I learned as an anthropologist –people love to tell their stories.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is something I learned as an anthropologist –people love to tell their stories.
sentences.sCn: 这是我作为一名人类学家所理解的----人们喜欢讲述自己的故事。

sentences.sContent: Fisher, a biological anthropologist, says she wrote her latest book because she wanted to uncover the science behind “why you love who you love and perhaps even help people find the one”.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fisher, a biological anthropologist, says she wrote her latest book because she wanted to uncover the science behind “why you love who you love and perhaps even help people find the one”.
sentences.sCn: 费舍尔，生物人类学家，说她的最新著作的出发点是缘于她想揭开“为什么你会爱上你的爱人，这也许会帮助人们找到爱人”背后的科学依据。

sentences.sContent: A data manager, media coordinator, and medical anthropologist will also be arriving over the weekend.
sentences.sContent_eng: A data manager, media coordinator, and medical anthropologist will also be arriving over the weekend.
sentences.sCn: 一名数据管理员、媒体协调员和医学人类学家也将于周末抵达。

words.tran: 人为的；[人类] 人类起源的
以人类为中心的；以人类观点解释宇宙万物的
人类起源学的；人类起源的
人类本位说；人类中心说
